name: Bloober Team
info:
• 别名: Bloober Team S.A
  • 生日: 2008年11月6日
  • 引用来源: enwikipedia
  • 官方网站: https://blooberteam.com/
detail: Bloober Team S.A. is a Polish video game developer based in Kraków. Founded in November 2008, by Peter Babieno and Peter Bielatowicz, the company is best known for developing Layers of Fear (2016), Observer (2017), and Blair Witch (2019). In January 2018, Bloober Team received the Paszport Polityki award in the "Digital Culture" category.

works.name: Layers of Fear 2 / 层层恐惧2
